Song.Title: Cheer Up
Song.Lyrics:
sandaneun geon da geureon georaeyo
himdeulgo apeun naldo manchiman
sandaneun geon chamjoheun georaeyo
oneuldo sugo manheusyeosseoyo

eo tteoke jinaesyeonnayo
oneul do hanjan geolchisyeonnayo
tte utdaero doeneun il eobseo
hansumi nado seulpeomaseyo

eoneu gureume biga deureonneunji nuga ara
saldabomyeon naegedo joheun nari ondamnida

sandaneun geon da geureon georaeyo
himdeulgo apeun naldo manchiman
sandaneun geon chamjoheun georaeyo
oneuldo sugo manheusyeosseoyo

ye opjibi bureoungayo
chinguga yojeum jallaganayo
namdeure un da joha boyeo
soksanghaejyeo do seolpeomaseyo

saram mada algo bomyeon
mal motal sayeondo manha
insaengi byeolgeo innayo
geogiseo geogiingeoji

sandan eun geon da geureon georaeyo
himdeulgo apeun naldo manchiman
sandaneun geon chamjoheun georaeyo
oneuldo sugo manheusyeosseoyo

sa ndaneun geon da geureon georaeyo
sesangirira n al su eobtjiman
sandaneun geon cham meotjin georaeyo
moduga naeildo himnaeseyo

oneuldo sugo manheusyeosseoyo
